# The `HotnessThresholdParser.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements a simple parser to decode commandline option for remarks hotness threshold that supports both int and a special &#39;auto&#39; value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file implements a simple parser to decode commandline option for remarks hotness threshold that supports both int and a special &#39;auto&#39; value.
